title: EastEnders' actress Kim Fox will return to soap this Christmas after five months out
text:
Get the biggest soaps stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Soap favourite Kim Fox will make a surprise comeback to EastEnders this Christmas.

Tameka Empson , who plays her character, will be reprising the role once again after spending five months away from the hit BBC soap.

The actress told the Daily Star : "Kim has been working in Scotland as a tour guide. If anyone can do that, it's Kim.

"But she's coming back soon. And I'm hoping it will be a big storyline. With Kim Fox it’s got to be big. We can't just have her turning up at the cafe.

"I don’t know what I'll be doing. All I know is it will be a Christmas cracker!"

Tameka, 42, has played Kim's character on the show for decades - and has become a hit with the millions of viewers.

Speaking at the National Lottery Awards, Tameka added: "It will be great to be back on set. Being at EastEnders is like going on a holiday. Even though it’s work, I enjoy it.

(Image: BBC / Kieron McCarron)

"I’ve had fans saying they want to see Kim back on the show, which is really nice. It's really lovely. I do miss playing her. She keeps me on my toes. She keeps me busy.

"What I love is that we have seen Kim grow. She's not a one-trick pony. Initially she was the happy factor, which was great. But now she's a mother and we've seen her manoeuvre through life."

(Image: BBC / Kieron McCarron)

EastEnders bid goodbye to the legend in July as she left Albert Square after starring on the show since 2009.

However an insider confirmed to Mirror Online that Kim would be returning after a break.

(Image: BBC / Jack Barnes)

(Image: BBC)

She told her sister Denise that she's moving away from Walford to start a new job in Scotland.

The two sisters use the news to put their differences aside after months of bickering over the salon.

Kim's ten years in the BBC soap has seen her give comic relief in the middle of huge bust ups and grizzly storylines.
description: Feisty Kim Fox will make her return to Albert Square this Christmas
